sn38.12:1.1: “Reverend Sāriputta, they speak of this thing called ‘grasping’.
sn38.12:1.3: “Reverend, there are these four kinds of grasping.
sn38.12:1.4: Grasping at sensual pleasures, views, precepts and observances, and theories of a self.
sn38.12:1.5: These are the four kinds of grasping.”
sn38.12:1.6: “But, reverend, is there a path and a practice for completely understanding these four kinds of grasping?”
